## Observation notes  
First documented by Fletcher, 1902, with extensive historical record in the Pacific Maritime (see Best list for historical record to 2000). Biodiversity Galiano Life List: (K. Harris), 2017, Galiano (specimen LRB17-3790, Lincoln Best, private collection). Ratti et al. 2008: <span class="hl-place-name">Fraser Valley</span>. Guzman et al., 2023: (Elle), 2005; (Gielens), 2009; (Wray), 2012; (Kelly), 2017, <span class="hl-place-name"><span class="hl-place-name"><span class="hl-place-name">Vancouver</span> Is</span>land</span>. NBSBC Bee Atlas Database: (Zand), 2021, 2022, 2023; (Gadzik), (Young), 2022, <span class="hl-place-name"><span class="hl-place-name"><span class="hl-place-name">Vancouver</span> Is</span>land</span>; (Cruise), 2022, <span class="hl-place-name">Sunshine Coast</span>; (Young), 2022, <span class="hl-place-name">Squamish</span>. iNaturalist: widespread throughout the Pacific Maritime, from 2006.
